abstract: At a time when most companies are scrambling for a prime seat on the green bandwagon, why not a company-branded wind farm?
snippet: At a time when most companies are scrambling for a prime seat on the green bandwagon, why not a company-branded wind farm?
lead_paragraph: Companies have long been willing to pay a lot of money to attach their names to prominent places. The future home of the New York Mets in Queens will be called Citi Field, after Citigroup. The Academy Awards ceremony takes place at the Kodak Theater in Los Angeles.

headline.main: Corporate Sponsorship for a Wind Farm
headline.print_headline: Corporate Sponsorship for a Wind Farm
